<annotation> <documentation>결과_배열건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> maxOccurs="unbounded" name="rsltList" type="tns:RSLT_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>결과_배열</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="RSLT_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="RSLT_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="owcoAprvlNo"> <annotation> /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
